member_organisations:
Rewilding Europe's Areas: https://rewildingeurope.com/areas/ 
 
European Rewilding Network (platform run by Rewilding Europe): https://rewildingeurope.com/european-rewilding-network/
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, International co-operation and development, Business and Industry, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Climate Action, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Birds and Habitat Directives; Natura 2000; CBD-Aichi Target 2; LIFE programmes; Horizon 2020; Climate change; EIB NCFF
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Rewilding Europe wants to make Europe a wilder place, with much more space for wildlife, wilderness and natural processes. Bringing back the variety of life for us all to enjoy and exploring new ways for people to earn a fair living from the wild. 
More information: https://rewildingeurope.com/our-story/
relevant_communication:
Publication of 'A Vision for a wilder Europe' at the WILD10 Conference in Salamanca (Oct. 2013). 
Presentations at the European Congress of Conservation Biology 
Policy Brief 'Making Space for Rewilding: creating an enabling policy environment' (2016)
